Name: Edessa
Description: The capital of Pella, known for its beautiful waterfalls and rich history as an ancient city.

Name: Pella
Description: The ancient city of Pella, once the capital of the Kingdom of Macedon and the birthplace of Alexander the Great.

Name: Aridaia
Description: A town in Pella, known for its thermal springs and natural surroundings.

Name: Skydra
Description: A municipality known for its agricultural economy and scenic landscapes.

Name: Almopia
Description: A municipality known for its natural beauty and historical significance, located near the borders of Pella.

Name: Vardar
Description: A rural municipality with a strong agricultural presence and rich natural resources.
